Part of Inspection¶

Part 1 - Minor Inspections¶

The minor inspections cover the following details.

  • Pre Flight Inspection
  • Post Flight Inspection
  • TFE731 Inspections
  • APU Inspections
  • 200 Hour Lubrication
  • 400 Hour Lubrication
  • 400 Hour Detailed - Walk-Around Inspection

PRE-FLIGHT INSPECTION 050001¶

Instructional Data

Note

Before you proceed with this inspection make sure that you have read and understood the Introduction section at the front of this schedule.

Pre-Flight Checks Outlines¶

Preamble
  1. General
  2. Left Nose and Fuselage
  3. Nose Landing Gear and Bay
  4. Right Nose and Fuselage
  5. Right Wing
  6. Right Main Landing Gear
  7. Right Engine and Nacelle
  8. Aft Fuselage — Right Side
  9. Empennage (Tail Section)
  10. Aft Fuselage — Left Side
  11. Rear Equipment Bay
  12. Left Engine and Nacelle
  13. Left Main Landing Gear and Center Keel
  14. Left Wing
  15. Flight Compartment
  16. Vestibule, Passenger Cabin and Toilet Compartment
  17. Final Items

List of Illustrations

General

Figure 1 - Recommended Walk-Around Sequence Airplanes Without Winglets

Figure 2 - Recommended Walk-Around Sequence Airplanes With Winglets

Preamble¶

The PRE-FLIGHT CHECKS supersede and replace the PRE-FLIGHT INSPECTION which was previously listed in the Hawker 800XP AIRCRAFT FLEXIBLE MAINTENANCE SCHEDULE.

It is the responsibility of the Flight Crew and Pilot-in-Command to ensure the items contained within are accomplished before flight. The Flight Crew or appropriately rated maintenance personnel may accomplish all items. It is recommended that these pages be photocopied and used as a check-off sheet prior to each flight.

Note

Requirements marked with(preceding the check) need only be completed once daily, before the first flight.

Note

These checks should be done prior to and in conjunction with the External Checks and Internal Checks listed in the Normal Procedures section of Approved Airplane Flight Manual.

Note

Refer to Figure 1 or Figure 2 (as applicable) — Recommended Walk-Around Sequence.

Figure 1: Recommended Walk-Around Sequence Airplane Without Winglets

Figure 2: Recommended Walk-Around Sequence Airplane With Winglets
